experience.title: About me
experience.text: I have experienced several different paths that permitted me to obtain great versatility and a unique ability to adapt. Before coding, I went through studies in chemistry, physics and journalism, with a solo trip to Southeast Asia that allowed me to learn to fend for myself. I now live in Colombia, a country that I greatly appreciate, and I continue to practise my knowledge of React.
experience.cv_text: You can learn more bout me by downloading my resume
experience.socials: You can also find me on Linkedin and GitHub

works.title: My projects
works.social_media: Creation of a social network with React for the front and Node.js for the back, and MySQL for the database.
works.wealth_health: Switch a saas web application from jQuery to React to improve performance. Test runs with Google Lighthouse and comparison between the two versions. Create and deploy a NPM package for the modal.
works.argent_bank: Create a web application that allows customers to log in and manage their accounts and profile using an API, and specify the  endpoints. Use of MangoDB.
works.sportsee: Creation of a web application that retrieves user's data via an API, and display its sports statistics via the Recharts Javascript library
works.kasa: Graphic redesign of an apartment rental website between individuals. Information retrieval from a database and dynamic display (carousels, drop-down menus...).
works.petits_plats: Use of different algorithms to find and sort recipes in a web application. Search via a main bar, or by the use of tags.
works.fisheye: Creation of a website for photographers that is accessible for people with visual disabilities. Use of a screen reader during creation of the website to ensure keyboard navigation is working well.
